properties.description:
Create an Azure Blob Storage account and name it adforchestrationstorage. When
creating the storage account, select the same region (that is, East US) as you selected
when you created the Data Factory instance. This will reduce our costs when moving data.
â€¢ Create a container named data within this storage account, and upload two CSV files to
the folder: airlines.csv and countries.csv (the files can be found on GitHub: https://
github.com/PacktPublishing/Azure-Data-Factory-Cookbook/tree/master/data)
